page.title: 10LIFE IN SYTCHAMPTON
page.content: Some of the{inhabitants}have not lived in Sytchampton for very long, but others have.Most of the children go to Sytchapton{School.}They have to cross the dual carriageway to get to it.The other children go to Stourport School, Ombersley School,and Droitwich high. Some people do their shopping in Droitwich,others do it in other places like Kiddiminster,Stourport,Ombersley, and Worcester. Most of the people go shopping in their car,but the rest walk. The people work in places like Birmingham. The village has a community hall, they organise dances for the younger generation and whist drives for old aged pensioners. The whist drive is on Friday nights only. There are no pensioners' clubs in Sytchampton, so they go to Ombersly called the Sunshine Club. The Parish Council meet in the hall once a month.
